Furra
Sight for MBT

I really liked the original style so I changed a lot things to make it nice for all vehicles. The file contains 3 version. Normal, High Zoom(13+), Range(distance slider)

This is a fork of highly edited sight from <3 Front_Wind.
Link to the original sight: https://live.warthunder.com/post/1087965/en/

+added borderless version
#universal #all_tanks #mbt

Vora
Sight for MBT

It`s a mix of a Israel and German sights with added barrel elevation on sides
Can be applied to all tanks.
